alert.note: Alert for Central Interior Cumberland; Coastal Cumberland; Coastal York; Interior York (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 28 at 11:10PM EST until January 29 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations up to two inches for a storm total of 2 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Central Interior Cumberland, Coastal Cumberland, Coastal York, and Interior York Counties. * WHEN...Until 11 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Even light snowfall amounts can accumulate on roads and cause dangerous driving conditions due to snow covered roads. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org

area.areaDesc: Central Interior Cumberland; Coastal Cumberland; Coastal York; Interior York
